Name: Bron Davies
AboutMe:
I am the owner and chief technologist at Brontech, LLC. I have over 16 years of software development experience in a wide variety of environments. The Brontech team is your best resource for web application development, SQL database architecture, mobile applications, and cloud solutions. Become more productive with solutions designed to eliminate your biggest bottlenecks. Improve your client satisfaction by creating software tools that allow you to deliver. Help your business show continuous improvement by extracting useful measurements from your data. Software gets complicated. By utilizing the latest technologies and methods, we can help your business design and create solutions that make sense.

Specialties: scrum methodologies, project management, web development, source code control, databases, video streaming, mobile applications, rich internet applications, multi-screen publishing and tools.
